name.ja: <ruby>破<rt>は</rt></ruby><ruby>械<rt>かい</rt></ruby><ruby>神<rt>しん</rt></ruby><ruby>王<rt>おう</rt></ruby>ヤマ

text.en:
2 Fiend monsters
If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Unchained" monster from your Deck or GY to your hand. If a card(s) you control is destroyed by battle or card effect while this card is in your GY: You can banish this card; Special Summon 1 Fiend monster from your hand or GY, then you can destroy 1 card you control. You can only use each effect of "Unchained Soul King Yama" once per turn.
